bibl.title: Roman Egyptomania. A Special Exhibition at The Fitzwilliam Museum, Cambridge, 24 September 2004 - 8 May 2005.
bibl.note: La plupart des documents présentés proviennent d'Égypte: monnaies, terres cuites, lampes, sculptures, etc.
bibl.seg: ASHTON Sally-Ann, with contributions from Ted BUTTREY and Adrian POPESCU, Roman Egyptomania. A Special Exhibition at The Fitzwilliam Museum, Cambridge, 24 September 2004 - 8 May 2005.
London, Golden House Publications, 2004, 4°, 198 pp., figg., nombr. pll. coul. ISBN 0-9547218-5-3. £25.
La plupart des documents présentés proviennent d'Égypte: monnaies, terres cuites, lampes, sculptures, etc.
